attributes.action: BAN SMOKING THROUGHOUT THE HOUSE OF COMMONS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: AS THE POLITITIONS HAVE SEEN FIT TO BAN SMOKING IN OUR PUBS AND CLUBS AND WORK PLACES.  WE BELIEVE THERE SHOULD BE A TOTAL BAN IN THE HOUSE OF COMMONS

rejection.details:
Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/OTSBIPP/
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
